title: Does original mean unique? - Quora
tags: English Word Definitions, Terminology, and Jargon

response.answer_text: It is not necessary that every thing which is original is unique because there are many things which is common but original. Apart from this any thing which appears different than others like a person, any idea, any object or anything else. A different idea can be a unique idea. Have you ever listened anyone saying original idea?
